price: "Kuma lalle ne mũ ba mu sani ba, shin, sharri ne aka yi nufi ga waɗanda ke cikin ƙasa, ko Ubangijinsu Yã yi nufin shiriya a gare su ne?"
arabic: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدۡرِيٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ أَرَادَ بِهِمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ رَشَدٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-annā lā nadrī asharrun urīda biman fī al-arḍi am arāda bihim rabbuhum rashadan
